author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-I-mobile to offer off-floor distribution of shares
text:
April 3 (Reuters) - I-mobile Co Ltd
* Says it will offer an off-floor distribution of 1 million shares on Tokyo Stock Exchange between April 10 and April 17
* Offering price will be determined based on the closing share price of the day before the distribution
* Says the limitation for distribution is up to 500 shares for each customer
Source text in Japanese: goo.gl/5qfYaD
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
